commit.message:
Multiplayer + init Categories page (#106)

# Multiplayer
As a user, I want my colleagues to see the changes that I have just saved on a VSM they are also viewing.
Closes #92 

Still have some bugs, but might be resolved later:
- [ ] #124
- [ ] #125
- [ ] #127
- [ ] #126

# Categories page
Started on the categories page #112
----
* multiplayer, live indicator top right with some hover messages

* Init categories page. category-filter + helper gif and hide forever. init edit category text flow

* add QIPs page and individual qip page

* secret live overview page

* run docker as non-root

* change lineheight to 15 in canvas cards

* custom 404 page

* center user-icon in the menu top right. 

* secret Settings page
settings page to reset helper dialogs etc...

* Secure the socket connection. Validate JWT token

Got good help from this example setup here: https://github.com/slathrop/jwt-azure-ad-bearer-example

ref issue #116

* fix hook error

Closes #123
